{\"text\":\"Welcome to PotatoCraft!\\n\\nNo buildinganywhere on the spawn island without permission.\\n\\nShops on the spawn island must beapproved by AlmightyZing.\"}","{\"text\":\"All redstone farms must have an off switch. Ifthey do not and they start causing lag they will be disabled by AlmightyZing.\\n\\nTo helpcombat lag, the max entities in a single block is 24. Any more and some will startdying.\"}","{\"text\":\"Points of Interest\\n\\nDesignated Mining Areas\\n\\nSand Desert:\\n-2500, -1250\\n\\nMesa:\\n1800, 2000\\n\\nIce Spikes:\\n0, -1550\\n \"}","{\"text\":\"Worldborder is 5000 blocks in each direction from spawn.\\n\\nFullrules:\\nLinkToRules\\n\\n\\nHavefun!\"}"],title:PotatoCraft,author:AlmightyZing,generation:3,display:{Lore:["PotatoCraftRules and Information"]}}
